message.subject: Oasis Dairy Farms Judgement
message.content:
M1.1. Earlier this year I requested that the Enron litigation unit file suit against Oasis Dairy for collection of unpaid transport bills on TW.
[Inform: lawsuit against Oasis Dairy earlier this year that Kevin requested, for collection of unpaid transport bills on Transwestern Pipeline]
Sflink1.1
M1.2. The suit was filed in the fifth judicial district court in Chaves County, NM.
[Inform: location of court in which suit was filed]
M1.3. On October 1, 2001, TW was granted summary judgement in the case by the court in the amount of $29,250.56 inclusive of back interest and attorney fees.
[Inform: date on which TW was granted summary judgment, for specified amount]
Sflink1.3
M1.4. This amount will continue to accrue interest at 8.75% per annum until paid by Oasis.
[Inform: annual rate at which interest on this amount will continue to accumulate, until Oasis pays the amount]
M1.5. If you would like a copy of the judgement, please let me know.
[Inform: recipient(s) should tell Kevin if they would like a copy of the judgment]
M1.6. kh
[Conventional: signature]

message.subject: Oasis Dairy Farms Judgement
message.content:
M9.1. Bonnie White is the attorney.
[Inform: name of attorney who Kevin has been working with]
Blink7.2
M9.2. I have already called her to find out what our collection process is (if any).
[Inform: Kevin called Bonnie to find out about collection process, if there is one]
Blink7.3
M9.3. I know some guys named Guido and Mario who'll be happy to do it for 50% of the money.
[Inform: Guido and Mario will work for half price]
M9.4. I'll let you know what I find out.
[Inform: Kevin will let Tracy know what he finds out]
M9.5. kh
[Conventional: signature]
